info.title: Business Place (Synchronous)
info.description:
This service provides queries about business places based on countries/regions or scenarios. The detailed information you can query is as follows:
 - Enablement status of a business place in the current business scenario. Based on the enablement status, customers can decide the field status of the business place on the UI, which can be invisible, display only, optional or mandatory.
 - List of business places by input variants.
 - Detailed information about business places, such as tax registration number and address.
 - Attributes of country/region-specific business places.

x-sap-shortText: Read specific business place information using this synchronous inbound service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Business Place (GLO_BUSINESS_PLACE)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Gets the list of business places.
get.description: Gets the list of business places, including address, tax number, and country/region-specific information.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Gets business place information from the list of business places.
get.description: Gets business place information from the list of business places, including address, tax number, and country/region-specific information.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Gets a single record of business place and related country/region-specific information.
get.description: Gets a single record of business place and related country/region-specific information with the company code and business place ID. You can get information such as address, tax number and a list of country/region-specific information.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Get the display properties of the Business Place field.
get.description: Get the display properties of the Business Place field by specifying the scenario ID and company code.

parameters.name: ScenarioID
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

parameters.name: CompanyCode
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BusinessPlaceSet HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

Country/Region Information of Business Places (for update)

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.
